name: part_006
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】Amazing Swing ⧸ 3D新衣装お披露目＆重大告知あり！【 #角巻わため4周年 】 [W6hZ1EYa37g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Starlight' by Tsunomaki Watame and Oozora Subaru.
MC section where Watame talks to the audience about the guest performances.

subtitles.original: スターライト
subtitles.english: Starlight

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：DIVELA
subtitles.english: Lyrics & Composition: DIVELA

subtitles.original: 描いた 未知のキャンバス
subtitles.english: The unknown canvas I drew on

subtitles.original: 重ねる景色
subtitles.english: Overlapping scenery

subtitles.original: つないでみて 繰り返してく衝動
subtitles.english: Try connecting them, the repeating impulse

subtitles.original: 揺らいだ 目の前に広がる世界
subtitles.english: The swaying world spreading before my eyes

subtitles.original: 星屑のメロディ 歌に乗せてた
subtitles.english: I put the stardust melody into a song

subtitles.original: グッと鮮やかに 眩ませるように
subtitles.english: Vividly, as if to dazzle

subtitles.original: 駆け抜けるよ スターライト
subtitles.english: I'll dash through, Starlight

subtitles.original: We can fly so! 僕らは いつしか
subtitles.english: We can fly so! Before we know it, we...

subtitles.original: 夢の中惹かれて ただがむしゃらに 走り続けたよ
subtitles.english: ...were drawn into a dream, and just kept running recklessly.

subtitles.original: 無限の宇宙に 響いて
subtitles.english: Resonating in the infinite universe,

subtitles.original: 君を照らす声は どこへだって
subtitles.english: the voice that lights you up, anywhere...

subtitles.original: ひらり 飛んでいけるさ
subtitles.english: ...it can flutter and fly!

subtitles.original: 愉快な 仲間と歩いた日日常
subtitles.english: The happy days I spent with my friends,

subtitles.original: 掴んでみて 指先の意図せ
subtitles.english: try grasping them, the intentions of my fingertips.

subtitles.original: 滲んでいく 目の前に広がった限界は
subtitles.english: The boundaries that blurred before my eyes...

subtitles.original: みんなの手重ねて ぶち壊して
subtitles.english: ...let's stack our hands and break them down!

subtitles.original: 吸い込まれそうな 夜空を見上げて
subtitles.english: Looking up at the night sky that seems to suck me in,

subtitles.original: 今叫ぶよ スターライト
subtitles.english: I'll shout out now, Starlight!

subtitles.original: I wanna be so! 僕らは いつでも
subtitles.english: I wanna be so! We will always...

subtitles.original: そばで笑い合って 溢れる声が 遠く木霊する
subtitles.english: ...smile together, and our voices will echo far away.

subtitles.original: 願いのカケラ 灯して
subtitles.english: Lighting the fragments of our wishes,

subtitles.original: 君の腕を引いて どこへだって
subtitles.english: taking your hand, anywhere...

subtitles.original: ひらり 飛んでいけるさ
subtitles.english: ...it can flutter and fly!

subtitles.original: ちょっと不安な日も
subtitles.english: Even on days when I'm a bit anxious,

subtitles.original: 魔法をかけてハッピー
subtitles.english: I'll cast a spell and be happy!

subtitles.original: 百人力で乗り越えていこう
subtitles.english: Let's overcome it with the strength of a hundred!

subtitles.original: アクアブルーに染まる 大空目掛けて
subtitles.english: Aiming for the vast sky dyed in aqua blue,

subtitles.original: 鼓動が弾んでいく
subtitles.english: my heartbeat starts to bounce!

subtitles.original: We can fly so! 僕らは
subtitles.english: We can fly so! We...

subtitles.original: この日をずっと待ってたんだ
subtitles.english: ...have been waiting for this day forever!

subtitles.original: まだ覚めないで
subtitles.english: Please, don't wake up yet!

subtitles.original: スターライト！僕らは 止まらない
subtitles.english: Starlight! We won't stop!

subtitles.original: その光が消える 1秒前まで 走り続けよう
subtitles.english: Let's keep running until one second before that light fades out!

subtitles.original: 無限の宇宙に 響いて
subtitles.english: Resonating in the infinite universe,

subtitles.original: 君を照らす声を 強く抱いて
subtitles.english: holding the voice that lights you up tightly...

subtitles.original: きらり 輝いていけ！
subtitles.english: ...go and shine brightly!

subtitles.original: いやあ！楽しいねえ！
subtitles.english: Wow! This is fun!

subtitles.original: やあゲストパートもね、一区切りつきまして
subtitles.english: Well, the guest part has come to a close,

subtitles.original: このロボ子ちゃんとマリンちゃんとスバルちゃんという
subtitles.english: with Roboco-chan, Marine-chan, and Subaru-chan,

subtitles.original: かなり珍しい組み合わせだったのではないでしょうか
subtitles.english: which I think was a pretty rare combination.

subtitles.original: でもね、もうずっとずっと呼びたいと思ってたね、みんなだからね
subtitles.english: But you know, they're all people I've wanted to invite for a long, long time,

subtitles.original: こうやって一緒に歌って踊って
subtitles.english: so being able to sing and dance together like this,

subtitles.original: なんかね、セクシーな感じもね、出せたりとか
subtitles.english: and showing a bit of a sexy side,

subtitles.original: かっこいい感じも出せたりとかね、してたよね？
subtitles.english: as well as a cool side... we did that, right?

subtitles.original: セクシーじゃない、してたよね？
subtitles.english: Not sexy? We did it, didn't we?

subtitles.original: あれはセクシーだったよね、みんな
subtitles.english: That was sexy, wasn't it, everyone?

subtitles.original: ま、ね、いろんな、まあ、わためをちょっと見てもらえたんじゃないかなーと思っております
subtitles.english: Well, I hope you were able to see various sides of Watame.

subtitles.original: まあ、もうね、活動4周年ですから
subtitles.english: I mean, it's already my 4th anniversary,

subtitles.original: ちょっと成長した姿もね、見せたいなーなんて思って
subtitles.english: so I wanted to show you a slightly more grown-up side of myself.

subtitles.original: 今フェロモン出てるから
subtitles.english: I'm putting out pheromones right now.

subtitles.original: 見せたいなーなんて思って、頑張りました
subtitles.english: I wanted to show you that, so I did my best.

subtitles.original: いやーどうだったかな、楽しんでくれてるよね？
subtitles.english: I wonder how it was... you're enjoying it, right?

subtitles.original: いやー、わためはとっても楽しいです。いやめちゃくちゃ楽しい
subtitles.english: Man, Watame is having so much fun. It's incredibly fun.

subtitles.original: こうやって3Dになって、衣装も...
subtitles.english: Becoming 3D like this, and with this outfit...
